message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $14,000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget.
Bob, I understand your position, but I'm confident this product offers you significant value beyond the price. Would you consider meeting in the middle at $13,250?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget.
